net.proteusframework.cms.component.page

Interface PageProperties

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.i2rd.cms.PageMetaInformation
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Page, PageTemplate

    public interface PageProperties
extends com.i2rd.cms.PageMetaInformation
    Page properties.

    Properties specified here can be specified on both a PageTemplate and a Page

    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

    • Method Detail

      • getAvailableLocales

        Set<Locale> getAvailableLocales()
        Get available locales. This property indicates what locales a given page is configured to support. Since the elements contained within a Page/PageTemplate could have mixed localizations, specification of supported locales for a page is explicit. This intended to be used for content negotiation and to assist in identifying localizations that may need to be updated when content changes are made.
        Returns:
        Returns the availableLocales.

      • getCssName

        String getCssName()
        Get the name of the page properties.
        Returns:
        the name.

      • getElements

        List<ContentElement> getElements(Box box)
        Get a list of ContentElements for a box.
        Parameters:
        box - the box.
        Returns:
        the beans. Never null.

      • getId

        long getId()
        Return the identifier for this page properties.
        Returns:

      • getNDEs

        Set<NDEList> getNDEs()
        Get the set of NDEs that are used to represent the page.
        Returns:
        the non data elements, such as CSS.
